description: Major breakthrough in quantum computing achieved at IBM Research, demonstrating 99.9% fidelity in quantum error correction.
International Conference on Artificial Intelligence opens in San Francisco with 5000+ attendees.
Anthropic announces Model Context Protocol (MCP) as open standard for AI agent integration.
NASA releases updated climate data showing accelerating changes in polar ice coverage.
SpaceX successfully launches Starship mission to establish lunar base construction materials depot.
Phase 3 clinical trial results show 95% efficacy rate for new Alzheimer's treatment.
Breakthrough in solid-state battery technology promises 10x energy density improvement.
New AI safety protocols adopted by major tech companies following industry consortium agreement.
